articles.author: Kaan Serin
articles.title: Almost 100 modders spent 5 years making Fallout London, an RPG mod so expansive its creators call it "Fallout 4.5" - Gamesradar
articles.description: A 20-hour main quest makes this more than your everyday fanmade mod
articles.content: Fallout London, the expansive fanmade Fallout 4 mod that shows us The Big Smoke's version of the nuclear post-apocalypse, is out now after a very lengthy development. But it's ballooned so much after… [+2257 chars]
